page.name: Mason High School Pickleball Club
page.description: This club will allow students to play pickleball once a week at the Pickle Lodge in West Chester throughout the entire school year. We will be playing every Wednesday from 4-5pm. Cost is $10 per player. Sign up is first come first serve basis. Transportation is NOT provided. Final Forms must be completed before participation. Instruction is provided at an extra cost.
page.additionalTitle: Parent of Bradley Curtiss (works at ME)
page.sectionOneContent: You will be emailed directions on how to register with The Pickle Lodge. Payment will be done through them and not the school.
